name: QA - Brickwork
Prestart
Approval from Summerset foreman to begin blocklaying
Setting out checked back to grid and datum as per architect setting out drawings
DPC installed and checked before works commence
Brick/ block work Installation
Mortar mixed correctly and colour consistent
Premium white mortar is used as per specification plan
Mortar joints are in alignment
Cavity width correct
Cavity insulation installed as per plan
Standard Brick ties installed as per the specifications with correct spacing
Fero brick ties and retaining clips installed as per the manufactures recommendations
Cavity and brick ties free of mortar and debris
Weep-holes checked and accurate (required every 3 bricks at base and sills)
Brick sill installed and checked – 15 degree consistent fall
Façade bricks are installed as per plan
Double layers of bricks are installed as per plan
Both Horizontal and vertical fire cavity barrier installed - this is to be offered to Summerset before work scontinue to check and ensure verything is installed correctly*
Brickwork line and level t ospecification tolerances
Movement joints installed as pers etting out drawings
Hand over
Final clean and handover
Brick shelf Angle
Installed to sepecification and drawings
Correct Fixing used
Brick support angle is line and level
Toque check carried out on fixings and record results on checksheet
Any damaged to galvanis3 finish has been made good with correct galvanised spray
